wiki.content:
“Because We Can” is the first single from the album What About Now. Song was written by Jon Bon Jovi, Richie Sambora and Billy Falcon. 
        
User-contributed text is available under the Creative Commons By-SA License and may also be available under the GNU FDL.
wiki.summary: “Because We Can” is the first single from the album What About Now. Song was written by Jon Bon Jovi, Richie Sambora and Billy Falcon.

track.name: Because We Can
comments: This must be the most horrendous solo in Bon Jovi-history. [3] cmon man!
Very good!
Muito bom
I can't stop listening to it. [6]
I can't stop listening to it. [5]
I can't stop listening to it. [4]
...But the chorus makes me a little confused. Why does he sing "I" the whole time and end with a "Because WE Can"?
I really like how he sings in the verses. This song overall makes me really happy.
love the song, can't wait for the concert in july <3
I can't believe I almost have 400 scrobblings of this song.
It is not Keep the Faith but it is ok :)
I can't stop listening to it. [3]
Not so good
HOLY FUCK NEW SONG.
This must be the most horrendous solo in Bon Jovi-history. [2]
Grande Bon Jovi!!!
not so good,not so bad
This must be the most horrendous solo in Bon Jovi-history.
It is ok but pales in comparison to previous singles but then again it is only a single, doesn't necessarily represent the whole album.
